verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came again unto me, saying<WH559>,
Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, set<WH7760> thy face<WH6440> against the Ammonites<WH1121> <WH5983>, and prophesy<WH5012> against them;

And say<WH559> unto the Ammonites<WH1121> <WH5983>, Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Because thou saidst<WH559>, Aha<WH1889>, against my sanctuary<WH4720>, when it was profaned<WH2490>; and against the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>, when it was desolate<WH8074>; and against the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063>, when they went<WH1980> into captivity<WH1473>;

Behold, therefore I will deliver<WH5414> thee to the men<WH1121> of the east<WH6924> for a possession<WH4181>, and they shall set<WH3427> their palaces<WH2918> in thee, and make<WH5414> their dwellings<WH4908> in thee: they shall eat<WH398> thy fruit<WH6529>, and they shall drink<WH8354> thy milk<WH2461>. men: Heb. children

And I will make<WH5414> Rabbah<WH7237> a stable<WH5116> for camels<WH1581>, and the Ammonites<WH1121> <WH5983> a couchingplace<WH4769> for flocks<WH6629>: and ye shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.

For thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Because thou hast clapped<WH4222> thine hands<WH3027>, and stamped<WH7554> with the feet<WH7272>, and rejoiced<WH8055> in heart<WH5315> with all thy despite<WH7589> against the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>; hands: Heb. hand feet: Heb. foot heart: Heb. soul

Behold, therefore I will stretch out<WH5186> mine hand<WH3027> upon thee, and will deliver<WH5414> thee for a spoil<WH957> <WH897> to the heathen<WH1471>; and I will cut thee off<WH3772> from the people<WH5971>, and I will cause thee to perish<WH6> out of the countries<WH776>: I will destroy<WH8045> thee; and thou shalt know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>. a spoil: or, meat
Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Because<WH3282> that Moab<WH4124> and Seir<WH8165> do say<WH559>, Behold, the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> is like unto all the heathen<WH1471>;

Therefore, behold, I will open<WH6605> the side<WH3802> of Moab<WH4124> from the cities<WH5892>, from his cities<WH5892> which are on his frontiers<WH7097>, the glory<WH6643> of the country<WH776>, Bethjeshimoth<WH1020>, Baalmeon<WH1186>, and Kiriathaim<WH7156>, side: Heb. shoulder of Moab

Unto the men<WH1121> of the east<WH6924> with the Ammonites<WH1121> <WH5983>, and will give<WH5414> them in possession<WH4181>, that the Ammonites<WH1121> <WH5983> may not be remembered<WH2142> among the nations<WH1471>. with: or, against the children of Ammon
And I will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> upon Moab<WH4124>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Because that Edom<WH123> hath dealt<WH6213> against the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> by taking<WH5358> vengeance<WH5359>, and hath greatly<WH816> offended<WH816>, and revenged<WH5358> himself upon them; by: Heb. by revenging revengement

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; I will also stretch out<WH5186> mine hand<WH3027> upon Edom<WH123>, and will cut off<WH3772> man<WH120> and beast<WH929> from it; and I will make<WH5414> it desolate<WH2723> from Teman<WH8487>; and they of Dedan<WH1719> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719>. they: or, they shall fall by the sword unto Dedan

And I will lay<WH5414> my vengeance<WH5360> upon Edom<WH123> by the hand<WH3027> of my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>: and they shall do<WH6213> in Edom<WH123> according to mine anger<WH639> and according to my fury<WH2534>; and they shall know<WH3045> my vengeance<WH5360>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Because the Philistines<WH6430> have dealt<WH6213> by revenge<WH5360>, and have taken<WH5358> vengeance<WH5359> with a despiteful<WH7589> heart<WH5315>, to destroy<WH4889> it for the old<WH5769> hatred<WH342>; for the: or, with perpetual hatred

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, I will stretch out<WH5186> mine hand<WH3027> upon the Philistines<WH6430>, and I will cut off<WH3772> the Cherethims<WH3774>, and destroy<WH6> the remnant<WH7611> of the sea<WH3220> coast<WH2348>. sea coast: or, haven of the sea

And I will execute<WH6213> great<WH1419> vengeance<WH5360> upon them with furious<WH2534> rebukes<WH8433>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>, when I shall lay<WH5414> my vengeance<WH5360> upon them. great vengeance: Heb. great vengeances
